channel.title: Datasets on The Data Liberation Project
channel.description: Recent content in Datasets on The Data Liberation Project

item.title: Federal Inmate Deaths
item.description: A spreadsheet of each federal inmate death since 2005, including demographic and cause-of-death information.

item.title: Boating Accident Report Database
item.description: Data on 58,430 boating accidents that occurred in 2009–2023 and were reported to state authorities.

item.title: Federal Inmate Complaints
item.description: Data on 1.78 million complaint/appeal submissions filed by federal prison inmates between January 2000 and late May 2024, spanning nearly 1 million distinct cases.

item.title: Commercial Fishing Incident Database
item.description: A national database of “fatalities and vessel disasters that occur in the US fishing industry.”

item.title: National Adult Maltreatment Reporting System
item.description: Agency- and case-level data from “the first comprehensive, national reporting system for adult protective services programs.”

item.title: Firearm Background Check Counts
item.description: Monthly counts of firearm background checks run by the FBI by month, state, and firearm type.

item.title: USDA Organic Program Enforcement
item.description: Outcomes of investigations spurred by complaints submitted to the USDA’s National Organic Program.

item.title: Water Use Inventory Records
item.description: Site-level records from the USGS’s water use inventory, indicating volumes of and types of water conveyed in a given year.

item.title: TSA Complaint Counts
item.description: Monthly counts of Transportation Security Administration traveler complaints by airport, category, and subcategory.

item.title: Unaccompanied Child Incident Reports
item.description: Incident reports submitted by government-funded facilities caring for unaccompanied immigrant children.

item.title: CFPB Enforcement Relief & Penalties
item.description: Amounts and dates of court-ordered relief and penalties in Consumer Financial Protection Bureau enforcement matters.

item.title: Peace Corps Resignation Counts
item.description: Counts of resigned Peace Corps volunteers by post and resignation reasons.

item.title: Veterans Affairs SSVF Survey Data
item.description: Data and reports from satisfaction surveys evaluating VA Supportive Services for Veteran Families (SSVF) program providers.

item.title: “Acute Hospital Care at Home” Data
item.description: Waiver applications and weekly/monthly reporting metrics from hospitals participating in the Acute Hospital Care at Home program.

item.title: Theft/Loss of Controlled Substances
item.description: Counts and quantities of controlled substance and regulated chemical thefts/losses reported to the DEA, by state, business activity, and loss type, and year.

item.title: Hazmat Transportation Incident Reports
item.description: Decades of hazardous material transportation incidents reported to the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration via Form 5800.1.

item.title: EPA Risk Management Program Database
item.description: Data from the Risk Management Plans submitted by US facilities handling certain hazardous substances.

item.title: APHIS Inspection Reports
item.description: Data on Animal Welfare Act inspections of commercial animal dealers, exhibitors (such as zoos), research facilities, and transporters.
